title: Lebron James:LeBron James Sent Tacos To Firefighters Fighting California Wildfires Because Nobody Can Work On An Empty Stomach
text:
Unless you have been living under a rock, you must be aware of the damage that the California wildfires are causing and this has made many people leave their homes. One such person is NBA star LeBron James. Well, safety is important and there was no other option.

NBA

Now while most people try to get far from the fire, there are those who have run towards it. Yes, we are talking of the brave individuals known as firefighters. They are fighting the fires with everything they got and when others rush out, they rush in.

AFP

These courageous souls who are the first responders, need every bit of support they can get and LeBron did just that when he sent a truck of free tacos to the fighters. It was a great gesture, after all, nobody can do their job on an empty stomach.

Don't Miss 15 K SHARES 10.4 K SHARES 7.3 K SHARES 9.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES

AFP

He praised their bravery and did his bit to help them out. After all these guys fight to keep the public safe, so little gestures like this go a long way in repaying the faith.

When stars like LeBron set the bar, the public will follow.
